Posts.Content: elysaleonard wrote: Hi, My mom is a 4 year survivor of breast cancer.  She developed ductal and lobular, one type in each breast at the same time and had a double mastectomy.  I am now revisiting the advice not to do genetic testing.  We have no other breast cancers in our family.  One of my mom's sisters is now in hospice for colon cancer but she is a long term heavy smoker.  Do you think my mom should be tested?  Doctor's orgininally said no since her cancer was postmenopausal but I am questioning this because of the two types of cancer.  I also have 3 young daughters to think about...  I need to be sure about my opinions and thoughts on this before going to my mom.  Any thoughts, wisdom would be greatly appreciated.  Thank you for your advice.
